scenes.situation: Harry and Ron discussing the mysterious object
The arrival of the broomstick package
scenes.text: As the owls flooded into the Great Hall...
So I suppose you think that’s a reward...

scenes.situation: Harry and Ron unwrapping the Nimbus Two Thousand
scenes.text: Wow,” Ron sighed, as the broomstick rolled onto Harry’s bedspread...
On Halloween morning they woke to the delicious smell of baking pumpkin wafting through the corridors...
Hermione Granger was shrinking against the wall opposite, looking as if she was about to faint...
A thousand live bats fluttered from the walls and ceiling while a thousand more swooped over the tables...
The common room was packed and noisy...

characters.name: Harry
characters.description: The main protagonist of the story.

characters.description: Ron's older brother and a prefect.
